sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of American Express topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.8%.
Year to date, American Express registers a 34.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 0.7%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 22.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Johnson & Johnson, trading down 0.1%, and Intel, trading up 1.6% on the day.
